content:
# The stone furnace has successfully produced 4 iron plates. However, it appears that no copper plates have been produced yet, which means the copper ore has not been processed.
# I will now extract the 4 iron plates from the stone furnace to add them to my inventory.

# Extract the iron plates from the stone furnace.
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=Position(x=-1.0, y=-1.0), quantity=4)

# After extracting the iron plates, I will check the updated inventory to confirm the addition.
print(f"Inventory after extracting iron plates: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Next, I will check the status of the stone furnace to see if it has started processing the copper ore.
print(f"Final Entities: {get_entities()}")
